languages.text: Магос Металлургикус предлагают осуществить масштабный подрыв тектонической плиты, который разбудит великие вулканы планеты. Плавильные цеха в их пылающих жерлах обеспечат выработку пластали невиданной чистоты. Землетрясения, тектоническая нестабильность и облака пепла, что навечно заволокут небо Кьявы Гамма, будут малой ценой за такой успех.

The Magos Metallurgicus are proposing a massive tectonic plate detonation to awaken the planet's great volcanoes. Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.
languages.original_text: Магос Металлургикус предлагают осуществить масштабный подрыв тектонической плиты, который разбудит великие вулканы планеты. Плавильные цеха в их пылающих жерлах обеспечат выработку пластали невиданной чистоты. Землетрясения, тектоническая нестабильность и облака пепла, что навечно заволокут небо Кьявы Гамма, будут малой ценой за такой успех.

Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

languages.text: El Magos Metallurgicus propone una enorme detonación de placas tectónicas que despertarán los grandes volcanes del planeta. Una serie de fundiciones instaladas en los conductos abrasadores podría producir plastiacero de una pureza incomparable. Los terremotos, la inestabilidad tectónica y las eternas nubes de ceniza que cubrirían los cielos de Kiava Gamma serían un precio ínfimo a pagar por semejante éxito.
languages.original_text: The Magos Metallurgicus are proposing a massive tectonic plate detonation to awaken the planet's great volcanoes. Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

traits.locale_text: El Magos Metallurgicus propone una enorme detonación de placas tectónicas que despertarán los grandes volcanes del planeta. Una serie de fundiciones instaladas en los conductos abrasadores podría producir plastiacero de una pureza incomparable. Los terremotos, la inestabilidad tectónica y las eternas nubes de ceniza que cubrirían los cielos de Kiava Gamma serían un precio ínfimo a pagar por semejante éxito.

languages.text: Le Magos Metallurgicus a émis l'idée de déclencher une détonation tectonique massive afin de réveiller les grands volcans de la planète. De cette manière, les fonderies déployées à l'intérieur de leurs cheminées magmatiques pourraient produire un plastacier d'une pureté incroyable. Les tremblements de terre, l'instabilité sismique et les nuages de cendres qui obscurciront à jamais le ciel de Kiava Gamma ne seront qu'un modeste prix à payer.
languages.original_text: The Magos Metallurgicus are proposing a massive tectonic plate detonation to awaken the planet's great volcanoes. Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

traits.locale_text: Le Magos Metallurgicus a émis l'idée de déclencher une détonation tectonique massive afin de réveiller les grands volcans de la planète. De cette manière, les fonderies déployées à l'intérieur de leurs cheminées magmatiques pourraient produire un plastacier d'une pureté incroyable. Les tremblements de terre, l'instabilité sismique et les nuages de cendres qui obscurciront à jamais le ciel de Kiava Gamma ne seront qu'un modeste prix à payer.

languages.text: 金属冶炼贤者建议诱发一场大规模的构造板块爆炸，唤醒行星上的巨型火山。这样一来，建造在火山喷发口上的熔炼车间可借此制造纯度极高的塑钢。尽管这会让基亚瓦伽马星板块构造失衡，地震频发，还会让行星终日笼罩在火山灰中，但在如此高纯度的塑钢面前，这样的代价不值一提。
languages.original_text: The Magos Metallurgicus are proposing a massive tectonic plate detonation to awaken the planet's great volcanoes. Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

traits.locale_text: 金属冶炼贤者建议诱发一场大规模的构造板块爆炸，唤醒行星上的巨型火山。这样一来，建造在火山喷发口上的熔炼车间可借此制造纯度极高的塑钢。尽管这会让基亚瓦伽马星板块构造失衡，地震频发，还会让行星终日笼罩在火山灰中，但在如此高纯度的塑钢面前，这样的代价不值一提。

languages.text: 賢人メタラギカスは、惑星の大火山を目覚めさせるために大規模な地殻変動プレートの爆発を提案している。その燃えさかる噴出孔の中にある製錬所では、信じられないほどの純度のプラスチールを生産することができるというのだ。地震、地殻変動、そしてキアヴァ・ガンマの空を永遠に包み込む灰の雲は、このような成功を考えれば小さな代償である。
languages.original_text: The Magos Metallurgicus are proposing a massive tectonic plate detonation to awaken the planet's great volcanoes. Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

traits.locale_text: 賢人メタラギカスは、惑星の大火山を目覚めさせるために大規模な地殻変動プレートの爆発を提案している。その燃えさかる噴出孔の中にある製錬所では、信じられないほどの純度のプラスチールを生産することができるというのだ。地震、地殻変動、そしてキアヴァ・ガンマの空を永遠に包み込む灰の雲は、このような成功を考えれば小さな代償である。

languages.text: Die Magos Metallurgicus schlagen eine gewaltige Detonation tektonischer Platten vor, um die großen Vulkane des Planeten zum Leben zu erwecken. Schmelzereien innerhalb ihrer flammenden Schlote können Plaststahl von unglaublicher Reinheit produzieren. Die Erdbeben, die tektonische Instabilität und die Aschewolken, die den Himmel von Kiava Gamma für immer verdunkeln werden, sind ein kleiner Preis für einen solchen Erfolg.
languages.original_text: The Magos Metallurgicus are proposing a massive tectonic plate detonation to awaken the planet's great volcanoes. Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.

languages.text: Magos Metalürjikus, gezegenin yüce volkanlarını diriltmek için devasa bir tektonik levha infilakı gerçekleştirilmesini öneriyor. Bacalarının içine inşa edilecek olan döküm atölyelerinde müthiş saflıkta plasçelik üretilebilecek. Depremler, tektonik istikrarsızlık ve Kiava Gama semalarını ebediyen kapatacak olan kül bulutları, bu başarı için ödenecek hafif bedeller.
languages.original_text: The Magos Metallurgicus are proposing a massive tectonic plate detonation to awaken the planet's great volcanoes. Smelting shops housed inside their flaming vents can produce plasteel of incredible purity. The earthquakes, tectonic instability, and ash clouds that will forever envelop the sky of Kiava Gamma are a small price for such a success.
